stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {1.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {100.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {-1000: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-50.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-0.5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'permit' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' or usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else {-100.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-1.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' else {-5.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' else {-0.5: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' else {-0.05: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' and carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' else {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {0: 1.0}
lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {economic_value + cancer_cost: 1.0} if (economic_value in [0.0, 1.0, 100.0] and cancer_cost in [-1000.0, -100.0, -50.0, -10.0, -5.0, -1.0, -0.5, -0.05, 0]) else {}
